subject: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:
Dear Mary,

I appreciate your response. I am Mr. Hassan Rouhani. From Burkina Faso I
live in the capital city Ouagadougou and wish to reassure you that the
transaction I have brought to you is properly planned for swift execution
depending on your approach and commitment to it. I decided to contact you
to cooperate with me in this transaction because with my ties to the Bank
there is no way my relation or friend who is not a foreigner can be
eligible to stand in claiming the deposit.

Before contacting you, I have gathered all relevant information about the
deposit which will help in facilitating easy transfer of the fund from my
Bank, You may come in person for collection on the agreed date of retrieval
or it could be airlifted or transfer under special arrangement with my Bank
so it can be delivered to you.

I want to reiterate once again that I will ensure that this transaction
will be carried out under a legitimate arrangement and a legal framework
that will protect you from any breach of the law. If after reading this
mail you think you have the capability of receiving this fund and investing
part of my share into a lucrative business for me under your management in
your country, then I will be willing to give you access to the particulars
of this deposit and be aware that you will have 50% of the above mentioned.

To create the necessary intimacy and rapport between us as to encourage me
releasing vital details of this confidential matter, since I need some
basic information required from you. Some of these-details I needed to
re-profile the deceased document so that your name and information will
appear as the inheritance beneficiary owner of the fund that will ensure
swift approval by my Bank after the application which I will draft for you
to send in.

I will proceed as soon as I receive your green light.

1. Your full name_________________________
2. Contact address___________________________________
3. Telephone number with code______________________________
4. Occupation___________________________________
5. Age__________________________________________
6. Sex______________________________________
7. Your status__________________________________
8. Country____________________________________________
9.Your fax number____________________________________
Best Regards,
        Mr. Hassan Rouhani
Tel.+22664945235 Call/WhatsApp me

subject: Re: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:
Dear Mr. Hassan Rouhani,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's fascinating to hear about the situation you're in, and I'm intrigued by the opportunity you've presented. I must admit, it's not every day that one gets an email like this!

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you tell me more about how this deposit came to be? And why is it that only a foreigner can claim it? 

Also, could you explain a bit more about what kind of business investment you're looking for? I'd love to understand better what kind of ventures you're interested in.

Lastly, I'm wondering if there are any other options for transferring the funds besides coming in person or having it airlifted?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: REMAIN BLESS
body:
Dear Mary,

Once again thank for your understanding and willingness to cooperate with
me in this, listen I can assure you that you will never regret handling it
with me as long as you listen and follow up my directives guide line, Mark
my word and hold me responsible if anything goes contrary apart from what i
assured you,

The Depositor now late is an adviser to formel Libya president, based on
the nature of the deposit and my tie to my bank is only a foreigner fit for
the claim, I cannot come out in person and apply for the claim not even my
family member or friends since they are all from here, It will create
suspicious if i present any of them and bank will block it so that is the
reason why i contacted you,

Well all my life i have been into banking sector never venture into any
business so i will depend on you if you have business idea, If not i will
prefer going into hotel business,

Of course there is, if you can't come if the need be, As soon as the fund
approved in your name, You have every right to ask bank for bank to bank
wire transfer directly to you any account of your choice don't worry about
that,

Waiting for the information i requested from you to enable do the reprofile
of the deceased file, Thank once again, My warm greetings to your entire
family,  I pray that you remain abundantly bless Insha Allah,
Best Regards,
        Mr. Hassan Rouhani
Tel.+22664945235 Call/WhatsApp me

subject: Re: REMAIN BLESS
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's interesting to hear about your connection with the late adviser to the former Libyan president. I'm curious, how did you come into contact with such a high-profile individual?

I appreciate your trust in me regarding this matter. However, I must admit that I'm not very familiar with banking procedures or business ventures. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what this process would entail? 

You mentioned something about reprofiling the deceased's file. What does that mean exactly? And how would it affect the claim process?

Also, you suggested a hotel business as a potential investment. That sounds intriguing! Do you have any experience in that field or any specific ideas in mind?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:
Dear Mary,

How are you and your entire family doing? I hope this email met you all in
good health, Well have gone through your mail sent to me but I must say
that some of your questions I considered it not necessary nevertheless i
will answer it,

Let's assume that you work as a hairdresser. Anybody who comes in your shop
you will attend to him or her. I am right. both big or small. You don't
need any special arrangement or whatsoever to know the person. If a
president or VP comes in there and requests FOR your service you will
attend to him right,

As a banker that same goes to me. I know him few years ago when i was the
head of bank foreign remittance department he was a big customer. And i was
appointed to oversee his account that's all.

You mentioned something about re-profiling the deceased's file. What does
that mean exactly? And how would it affect the claim process?

When i receive the information i requested from you, I will use it fill
places where next of kin supposed to be so that your name will appear as
inheritance beneficial owner of the fund because were never a next of kin
in the deposit, There after i will draft bank application form and send to
you.

You will then fill it and send in to my bank note  as soon as bank receive
it they will check and see that your name is in there as beneficial. Bank
will have no option than to approve the fund and transfer to your account.
Simple very simple like i stated early that all you need to do is to listen
and follow up my directives guide line. Maybe i will be among the staffs
that will conduct the transfer exercise when you apply,

Intense of business if you don't have any ideal in hotel matters no issues,
I think the most important thing now is for us to secure the fund first,
One can get adviser anything. Thank you once again for understanding, MY
warm greetings to your entire family. Waiting to hear from you positively,
Best Regards,
        Mr. Hassan Rouhani
Tel.+22664945235 Call/WhatsApp me

subject: Re: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed response. I hope this message finds you well. 

I understand that in your line of work, you deal with a variety of clients, big and small. It's interesting to hear about your experience as a banker and how it relates to the situation at hand.

Regarding the deceased's file, I was just curious about what kind of information it contains and how it might be relevant to our discussion. I'm sorry if my question seemed unnecessary; I'm just trying to understand the whole process better.

You mentioned filling out a bank form with my name as the beneficial owner of the fund. Could you please explain more about this? What kind of information will be required on this form?

Also, regarding the business aspect, while I don't have much experience in hotel matters, I am open to learning and seeking advice from experts in that field.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: FROM HASSAN
body:
Dear Mary,

Thank you once again for your response, How are you and your entire family
doing i hope fine,

Here, most top political office holders use to operate a secret accounts
for their safe and security reason,

When opening it they avoid using their family name so that if anything goes
wrong they will say the account is for them,

I needed the information I requested from you to enable me to fill the
place next of kin. So that your name will appear as the next of kin after i
will then present your application to my bank Board management.

The way I plan it. if you can listen and follow  my directives guide line i
can assure you that you will never regret handling it with me,

Thank you,
    Mr Hassan Rouhani

subject: Re: FROM HASSAN
body:
Hello Mr. Hassan Rouhani,

I hope this message finds you well. It's quite interesting to hear about the way top political office holders operate their secret accounts. I must admit, it's a world that is completely new to me.

Could you please explain more about the concept of 'next of kin' in this context? How does it work exactly? And what would be my role and responsibilities as a next of kin?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:
Dear Mary,

Thank you once again for your respond, Like i stated before all you need to
do is to listen and follow up my directives guide line that's all,

There is no rocket science on it, it's my duty to place your information i
requested as the next of kin strategically then present it to my bank board
management for approval, Your role and responsibility is to receive the
fund as soon as bank approved it that's all,
Regards
    Mr Hassan Rouhani

subject: Re: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:

Mary

subject: THANK YOU
body:
Dear Mary,

Simple you stands a person to inherited the fund, I already explain THIS

      Mr hassan Rouhani

subject: Re: MESSAGE FROM HASSAN ROUHANI
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed response. I hope this message finds you well.

I understand that in your line of work, you deal with a variety of clients, from the average person to high-ranking officials. It's interesting to hear about your experiences as a banker and how it relates to this situation.

Regarding the deceased's file, I was just curious about what kind of information it contains and how it might be relevant to our discussion. Is there anything specific in the file that would help expedite the claim process?

You mentioned filling out a bank form. Could you please provide more details about this form? What kind of information will I need to provide? 

Also, regarding the business aspect, while I don't have much experience in hotel matters, I'm open to learning and exploring new opportunities. Once we secure the fund, do you think it would be possible for me to get some advice or guidance on how best to invest or use it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

Mary

subject: Re: It was sent to you before
body:
Dear Mr. Hassan Rouhani,

Thank you for your detailed message and the opportunity you've presented. It's quite intriguing, I must say! I live in a small town myself, so it's fascinating to hear about life in Burkina Faso's capital city.

I'm curious about the process you've described. Could you perhaps elaborate on how this plan was devised? And how did you come across my contact information?

Also, could you provide more details about the deposit? What kind of deposit is it exactly? And why does it need to be claimed by a foreigner?

You mentioned that part of the fund would be invested into lucrative business under my management. Could you tell me more about what kind of business ventures you're interested in?

I appreciate your reassurances regarding the legality of this operation. However, I'd like to understand better how this will be carried out under a legitimate and legal framework. Could you explain this process further?

As for the information you requested from me, I'm afraid I can't provide those details at this time as we're still getting to know each other and discussing this opportunity.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Mary
